faq.whyChooseOMG: Why should I choose OMG Cleaning Service?
faq.whyChooseOMGAnswer: We offer 15+ years of professional cleaning experience with eco-friendly products, licensed & insured staff, and 100% satisfaction guarantee. Our team uses only safe, environmentally friendly cleaning products.
faq.whatServicesProvide: What cleaning services do you provide?
faq.whatServicesProvideAnswer: We offer comprehensive cleaning services including Office cleaning, Washing dishes, Dusting, Vacuuming and mopping, and Toilet cleaning.
faq.howBookServices: How can I book your cleaning services?
faq.howBookServicesAnswer: You can easily book our services through our website, mobile app, or by calling us directly. We offer flexible scheduling and real-time booking management for your convenience.
faq.discountsRegular: Do you offer discounts for regular cleaning?
faq.discountsRegularAnswer: Yes! We offer competitive pricing for regular cleaning schedules. Contact us for custom quotes based on your specific needs and frequency requirements.
faq.areProdctsSafe: Are your cleaning products safe and eco-friendly?
faq.areProductsSafeAnswer: Absolutely! We exclusively use eco-friendly, non-toxic cleaning products that are safe for your family, pets, and the environment. We're ISO 14001 certified for our green cleaning practices.
